summary: A beautiful Austrian refugee in England--who is also a Nazi agent--marries a scholarly English pacifist. He lives near a secret military base she needs to get information about so she can help in Hitler's planned invasion of England.
cast: Veronica Lake|Franchot Tone|John Sutton|Binnie Barnes|Henry Stephenson|Philip Merivale|Nils Asther|Edmund Breon|David Leland|Aminta Dyne|Harry Allen|David Clyde|Harry Cording|Marie De Becker|Leslie Denison|Charles H. Faber|Deidre Gale|Karen X. Gaylord|Mary Gordon|Boyd Irwin|Thomas Louden|Morton Lowry|Anthony Marsh|W. Somerset Maugham|Viola Moore|Nigel Morton|Marjean Neville|Tempe Pigott|Hilda Plowright|Otto Reichow|Ernest Severn|Raymond Severn|Ivan F. Simpson|Donald Stuart
title: The Hour Before the Dawn
